descrizioneBreve: UP&UP is a communication agency in Brescia, certified Google Premier Partner, known for its innovative 'Formula del Risultato' approach that links fees to client results.
descrizioneCompleta: UP&UP is a digital agency that combines technology and creativity to deliver the perfect marketing mix for business growth. Certified as a Google Premier Partner, part of the top 3% of Google Partners, and awarded Best in Quality by Google, UP&UP offers strategic marketing, visual identity, website and e-commerce design and development, SEO consulting, social media marketing, and digital marketing services. The agency operates with a win-win 'Formula del Risultato' approach, aligning their compensation with client success. The team consists of over 40 professionals with diverse skills working in synergy to achieve measurable results for clients.
serviziOfferti: Progettazione e sviluppo siti web ed e-commerce
